mapper.insert: insert into SYS_BASE_CODE(CODEGROUP, CODE, CODENAME, SORTKEY) values (#{CODEGROUP}, #{CODE}, #{CODENAME}, #{SORTKEY})
mapper.select: select * from SYS_BASE_CODE where CODEGROUP=#{CODEGROUP} and ISUSE ='Y'
select CODEGROUP, CODE, CODENAME, SORTKEY from SYS_BASE_CODE
select * from SYS_BASE_CODE where CODENAME LIKE '%' || #{CODENAME} ||'%'
select * from SYS_BASE_CODE where CODEGROUP LIKE '%' || #{CODEGROUP} ||'%'
mapper.update: update SYS_BASE_CODE set CODE=#{CODE} where CODEID=#{CODEID}
